1.name: The Breakfast Club
1.description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

2.name: Back to the Future
2.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

3.name: The Goonies
3.description: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on a quest to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

4.name: Clue
4.description: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up.

5.name: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
5.description: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

6.name: Idi i smotri
6.description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

7.name: Legend
7.description: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness (Tim Curry) from destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

8.name: National Lampoon's European Vacation
8.description: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

9.name: The Color Purple
9.description: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

10.name: Mask
10.description: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempt to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.

11.name: Rambo: First Blood Part II
11.description: Rambo returns to the jungles of Vietnam on a mission to infiltrate an enemy base-camp and rescue the American POWs still held captive there.

12.name: Return to Oz
12.description: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

13.name: Brazil
13.description: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error and becomes an enemy of the state.

14.name: St. Elmo's Fire
14.description: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

15.name: Witness
15.description: When a young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder, policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

16.name: Weird Science
16.description: Two high school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, but she turns their lives upside down.

17.name: Commando
17.description: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

18.name: A View to a Kill
18.description: The recovery of a microchip off the body of a fellow agent, leads James Bond to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

19.name: Better Off Dead...
19.description: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

20.name: Out of Africa
20.description: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

21.name: Rocky IV
21.description: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

22.name: Cocoon
22.description: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

23.name: Enemy Mine
23.description: During a long space war, the lives of two wounded enemies become dependent on their ability to forgive and to trust.

24.name: Teen Wolf
24.description: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.

25.name: Ran
25.description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

26.name: After Hours
26.description: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho who he met that evening at a coffee shop.

27.name: A Room with a View
27.description: In a Florence pensione circa 1900 with English guests, George Emerson (Julian Sands) and his dad (Denholm Elliott) offer their rooms with views to Lucy Honeychurch (Helena Bonham Carter) and her chaperone, Charlotte Bartlett (Dame Maggie Smith). Lucy and George get acquainted, but Lucy returns to England. George and Lucy meet again, but now she's engaged.

28.name: Fright Night
28.description: A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

29.name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
29.description: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

30.name: Red Sonja
30.description: The fearless female warrior Red Sonja sets out to avenge her family's murder and rid her kingdom of the tyrannical rule of evil Queen Gedren.

31.name: Ladyhawke
31.description: The thief Gaston escapes dungeon of medieval Aquila thru the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.

32.name: The Sure Thing
32.description: A college student plans a cross-country trip to get laid, but ends up traveling with a young woman. They hate each other, so naturally...

33.name: Explorers
33.description: A boy obsessed with 50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?

34.name: The Return of the Living Dead
34.description: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

35.name: The Black Cauldron
35.description: A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

36.name: The Heavenly Kid
36.description: A hip guardian angel named Bobby Fantana, who died in a car race in the 60s, reluctantly agrees to watch over lonely 80s high schooler Lenny Barnes who needs guidance on how to become cool.

37.name: Lifeforce
37.description: A race of space vampires arrives in London and infects the populace, beginning an apocalyptic descent into chaos.

38.name: Pee-wee's Big Adventure
38.description: When eccentric man-child Pee-wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

39.name: Silverado
39.description: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

40.name: Flesh+Blood
40.description: In medieval Europe, a young girl from a noble family is obsessed with her captors--commoners.

41.name: Friday the 13th: A New Beginning
41.description: Still haunted by his past, Tommy Jarvis - who, as a child, killed Jason Voorhees - wonders if the serial killer is connected to a series of brutal murders occurring in and around the secluded halfway house where he now lives.

42.name: Once Bitten
42.description: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

43.name: The Falcon and the Snowman
43.description: The true story of a disillusioned military contractor employee and his drug pusher childhood friend who became walk-in spies for the Soviet Union.

44.name: To Live and Die in L.A.
44.description: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

45.name: Re-Animator
45.description: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

46.name: Private Resort
46.description: The story of two adolescent boys who are guests at a Florida resort for the week-end. Their only interest is, of course, chasing girls, but fate has much more in store for them.

47.name: Perfect
47.description: A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, but it isn't love at first sight.

48.name: Just One of the Guys
48.description: Terry feels discriminated against when the summer jobs at Sun Tribune go to 2 guys. She decides to do something about it. She dresses like a guy and gets a haircut. Will students at the other high school notice? Girls notice "him".

49.name: Vision Quest
49.description: A high school wrestler in Spokane, Washington has trouble focusing on his training regimen when a beautiful young drifter takes up temporary residence at his home.

50.name: Runaway Train
50.description: Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker find themselves trapped on a train with no brakes and nobody driving.
